meanings.definition: The quality or state of being salty.
meanings.sent1: The saltness of the ocean water stung my eyes.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the saltness of the potato chips.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added too much saltness to the soup, making it inedible.
meanings.sent4: The saltness of her tears reflected the depth of her sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The air was filled with the sharp saltness of the sea, invigorating my senses.

meanings.definition: The presence of salt in something.
meanings.sent1: The saltness of the soil affected the growth of the plants.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the saltness of the sea breeze on my lips.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected saltness of the cake puzzled the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: The saltness of the air near the beach reminded me of childhood vacations.
meanings.sent5: The saltness of the tears on her cheeks hinted at the emotional turmoil within.

meanings.definition: The taste or flavor of salt.
meanings.sent1: The soup lacked the necessary saltness to bring out the flavors.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the subtle saltness of roasted almonds.
meanings.sent3: The unusual saltness of the ice cream surprised my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The saltness of the popcorn made it a perfect movie snack.
meanings.sent5: The dish was perfectly balanced with just the right amount of saltness.
